query:
WITH log as (
                        INSERT INTO task_log(task_id, warehouse_id, queue_name, state, status)
                        SELECT task_id, warehouse_id, queue_name, state, 'cancelled'
                        FROM task
                        WHERE status = 'pending' AND task_id = ANY($1)
                    )
                    DELETE FROM task
                    WHERE status = 'pending'
                    AND task_id = ANY($1)
